content: this lively crochet dishcloth features red heart scrubby stripes to create fun diagonal bands of color without having to change yarns stitched using the corner-to-corner technique you ll start at one end by crocheting a block using double_crochet stitches adding a block with each row until you reach the widest point then you ll decrease a block as you work your way to the opposite corner add a hanging loop with a simple chain and you ve got a dishcloth pattern includes both written instructions and a diagram for more visual learners shown in calypso 0265
